about_the_game:
Welcome to Topworld, the ultimate adventure in a world full of possibilities! Dive into an epic fantasy medieval world where you have the freedom to write your own story.

In Topworld, every object is destructible. Build your own world by collecting resources and creating fantastic structures. Forge powerful armor and weapons to arm yourself against the challenges of the world.

As a mage, you have an arsenal of unique abilities such as teleportation, a shockwave, a remote-controlled projectile, and even magical fishing! Use these abilities to explore and master your surroundings.

But beware: Topworld is not just a world of building and collecting, but also a world of combat. Face fearsome enemies and engage in exciting battles while wielding swords, drawing bows, and wielding shields.

Beyond combat, there are countless opportunities in Topworld to unleash your creativity. Build houses, lay down paths, decorate with a variety of furniture, and tame wild animals to ride. With terraforming, you can even sculpt the land to your liking, creating rivers and lakes to enhance the beauty of your world. Additionally, you can shape the plant life, designing lush forests, colorful gardens, and serene landscapes that truly make Topworld your own.

And all of this in an enchanting pixel art style that makes Topworld a charming and inviting place. Build your world from the comfort of your own home and embark on an adventure you'll never forget!

Features:
- Every object is destructible
- Crafting system for creating buildings, decoration, weapons and more
- Unique fantasy medieval setting
- Challenging enemies and exciting battles
- Diverse magic abilities
- Build your own puzzles
- Terraforming to create rivers and lakes
- Shape the plant life
- Cute pixel art style that invites dreaming
